attributes.action: Private Hire drivers should be allowed to get PCO Badge for euro 6 diesel cars.
attributes.additional_details: Stop TFL for this unjust action that they don’t allow private hire drivers to get a clean diesel car.
attributes.background: Government should Tell TFL to allow private hire drivers to get pco badge for 7seater euro 6 diesel cars as there is not a lot of option for drivers In electric cars.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about granting of PCO licences are a matter for the relevant licensing authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
